original_text: You have done the same wicked things. I have warned you many times, but you have not listened to me. I called out to you, but you refused to answer.” That is what the Lord says.
korean_text: 여호와의 말씀이니라 이제 너희가 그 모든 일을 행하였으며 내가 너희에게 말하되 새벽부터 부지런히 말하여도 듣지 아니하였고 너희를 불러도 대답하지 아니하였느니라

sentences.original_text: You have done the same wicked things
I have warned you many times
but you have not listened to me
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 너는 내 말을 듣지 않았다

sentences.original_text: That is what the Lord says
